state_summary: Justin Wenig, co-founder of Starbridge, discusses his experience with public sector sales and how Starbridge's platform helps streamline this process.
evidence: Coursedog was sold to JMI Equity for nine figures in 2021
Starbridge raised $42 million Series A led by Craft Ventures
The company has raised $52 million to date, after previously raising a $10 million seed
Starbridge's platform helps sales teams monitor opportunities in the public sector and provides insights such as ranked scoring of which accounts are most likely to purchase new technology

metadata.investor_name: Craft Ventures, Owl Ventures, Commonweal Ventures, Autotech Ventures
